archetypes.description: Master of arms, proficient with all weapons and armor. Warriors excel in direct combat and can effectively wield any weapon they find.
Light weapons specialist favoring speed and precision. Skirmishers excel with finesse weapons and ranged combat, avoiding heavy armor and two-handed melee weapons.
Arcane practitioner who channels magical energies. Mystics are proficient only with weapons that complement spellcasting, relying on magic rather than martial prowess.
Hybrid combatant blending martial and mystical techniques. Adepts are proficient with select melee and ranged weapons that support their versatile fighting style.
